website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy date stamp by a top brand that is ideal for anyone who uses this handy office tool regularly and wants top-of-the-line features and longevity.
pros: Distances itself from others we considered thanks to the professional-level structure with a steel frame and no-touch, built-in date bands
Also has a built-in ink pad capable of 10,000 stamps, plus 10 years of dates
cons: Ink is prone to smudging if it isn't totally dry
Ink pad should be stored separately to keep it from drying out, which can be a hassle

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice date stamp for a reasonable price. Holds up to use in the classroom. Fit and finish feel good- quality product. I purchased this based on the price of others and the reviews. For a teacher, I am looking for value and quality- something very hard to come by these days. This stamp fit it all and does the job it was intended to do!
customer_reviews.author: R. Fahrig

customer_reviews.title: Beware, it's not what is pictured!
customer_reviews.text: I was totally ok spending $40 on a metal stamp to keep them from breaking, but what arrived was fully plastic except for the frame around the bottom. It felt cheap and nothing like what I was expecting from the listing photo of brushed metal construction. Definitely not worth $40 for a plastic stamp.
customer_reviews.author: Megan H

customer_reviews.title: What a mess!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box, I was a little confused that there were no instructions. But, it’s a stamp, who needs instructions? Wrong. Ended up with ink all over my fingers trying to figure out how to insert the ink tray. Finally went to their website and watched a video. Then I couldn’t figure out how to change the date. Back to the website. Couldn’t get the lock button to work, so ended up with ink everywhere. Finally figured it all out and even managed to change the date, but not without ink everywhere. Too much of a hassle and not easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Pysh

customer_reviews.title: GOOD STAMP FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: It was time to buy a new stamp, and I wanted one that didn't slip . My old stamp was a very cheap one and the bands on it would slip after I had stamped a few documents, so I when I it was time to get a new one I wanted a better quality stamper. I'm very pleased so far with this stamp. It's sturdy, the bands don't slip, and the ink is nice and dark. The only thing I don't like so much is the band for the message is harder to turn than the date bands, but hopefully, it will turn easier with use. Overall, a very good stamp.
customer_reviews.author: OBXgirl

customer_reviews.title: Real PROFESSIONAL stamp
customer_reviews.text: really nice quality stamp, made in Austria. Has metal body and solid plastic pieces. Comes with interchangeable ink pad, dates that can be rotated without getting ink on your fingers. I can see this thing really lasting. Stamping is very smooth and feels solid. Can see this thing last a long time. Pros: Ergonomic, solid construction, eco friendly, changeable stamp pad, smooth mechanism Cons: Lack of instructions (took about 5 min to figure things out), the alignment seems to be designed for smaller than numbers on this pad.
customer_reviews.author: S. Y.

customer_reviews.title: SOLID
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a cheesy plastic stamp I bought in a fit of frugality. This baby has a solid, professional feel to it and I expect it to last through the 10 years available on the date band, making it well worth the price. I opted not to pay extra for the model with the two color stamp and "Received" memo on there though that would have been nice. If all you need is the date, you couldn't do better than this Trodat Stamp. I only wish the pad hadn't come pre-inked so I could have gone with red instead of black but I'll get over it.
customer_reviews.author: Never pay retail

customer_reviews.title: Great stamper!
customer_reviews.text: There's not a lot to say! I needed a self inking stamper for my job. This has a great weight to it. Looks and feels professional sitting on my desk. The ink gives a nice sharp print. I've had it for a month or 2 and the ink is still going strong. I think it's a good value for the price. So happy to not have to dig my stamp and pad out of my drawer each time I need a date stamp!
customer_reviews.author: SaraMarie

customer_reviews.title: Measure Carefully
customer_reviews.text: The stamper works great, it was just too wide for our jars. However, even though the product is listed as Prime, seller charges for return shipping (unless you have a Kohl's nearby), so be sure the item is the size you're looking for. Paying 35% of the item's cost to return it didn't seem very Prime to me.
customer_reviews.author: GAM

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic dater. I got so tired or hand-writing the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic dater. I got so tired or hand-writing the date a million times at work and the office's date stamps in the store room were terrible quality. This date stamper stamps the date evenly and the ink that is already in the ink plate is good quality. This has shaved off a lot of time at work. Also, it's heavy duty. I feel like this will last me a long time
customer_reviews.author: Geekella

customer_reviews.title: Why write the date?
customer_reviews.text: Man, I love this thing so far. I deal with so many papers as a high school teacher. It is so easy to whip this thing out and date stamp. Super quick to roll over to the next day. Students don't write the date on stuff, or it is a pain in the ass to try to get them to.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a first grade teacher who loves to put a date on everything. I had previously purchased a date stamp that was very, very small and cute. This one, however, is so much better for my purposes. I love, love, love the size. I can find it easily, and I love the little window that lets you know where the date stamp will be. Definitely a professional stamp. I'm over the moon happy with it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Quality date stamper
customer_reviews.text: Works well and is worth the extra expense. I was impressed with the quality so I bought another date stamperof this brand with custom lines added. However, not being available on Amazon, I ordered it from another retailer.
customer_reviews.author: Zazeyay

customer_reviews.title: No instructions that I could find.
customer_reviews.text: You kind of wing it with this. The cartridge didn't come installed and there were no instructions that I could see. I just had to figure it out. Other than that it seems to work fine.
customer_reviews.author: WAH

customer_reviews.title: Great stamp, definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good stamp overall. You have to make sure that the numbers line up when you change them, as there is no mechanism to keep things straight. It is really easy to adjust but If you aren’t mindful you may end up touching the ink pad (over time it gets easier to avoid). The mechanism that allows it to be self inking is a bit noisy but seems sturdy so I don’t foresee any issues.
customer_reviews.author: cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Package had clearly been opened before
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Sturdy and well made. A bit difficult to change the date as the numbers are obscured. The package had been opened before and was re-sealed with scotch tape. Advertised as new so turned me off.
customer_reviews.author: gmedmed

customer_reviews.title: MEH
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a new stamp for work, and it looks great, easy to use, and all that jazz. The only thing that bothers me is that it is not exactly straight when you stamp a piece of paper.
customer_reviews.author: Madisson Elise

customer_reviews.title: Not overly impressed
customer_reviews.text: Package looks like it was used before and there were no instructions at all. Was able to figure it out thanks to youtube, but I'm left wondering if I got a used product which was listed as new.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Silver

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because the one at my work only went to 2015 lol. This thing is heavy duty and I love it. The only downside is you have to replace the whole pad, whereas most you simply add fresh ink...overall it's awesome
customer_reviews.author: Liz George

customer_reviews.title: Feels sturdy and works well.
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Does not feel flimsy at all. Very sturdy. Bought one for the fiancé to use at work. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron M Meyers

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: I had such a hard time finding a mess free date stamp. I love this for work! Does exactly what it is suppose to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, bought this as a Christmas gift and it has already seen tons of use. Super easy to use and change the dates.
customer_reviews.author: **RiNat**

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once so far, but exactly what I wanted. Think it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Silvergirl

customer_reviews.title: Best date stamp
customer_reviews.text: Easy, convenient, and the ink can last a long time even though stamp every day, definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: KW.

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very smooth working, nice and heavy, not cheaply made. And a great price! The only downfall, it wouldn't ship to Hawaii, so I had to ship to a friend in Seattle. Use it daily, a lot, at work.
customer_reviews.author: 808Girl

customer_reviews.title: Still better readability than the 1/8"x* stamps but not as advertised ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it said the stamp impression size is 3/8" x 1-5/8" or 10mm x 41mm which is MASSIVE. What it actually is is 5mm x 26mm or 3/16"~13/64" x 1-1/64"... a fair bit smaller. Still better readability than the 1/8"x* stamps but not as advertised size. Mine goes to year 2025.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good stamper
customer_reviews.text: This does a nice job of keeping the ink off my fingers even when changing the ink pad.
customer_reviews.author: MJM

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Easy to change date. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable Stamper
customer_reviews.text: Great stamper, easy to change dates. I’ve been using it for a little over a month or so and it’s never given me any problems. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hwang

customer_reviews.title: Saves time
customer_reviews.text: Does what I need-savws time when having to write the date over and over again ( and I rather enjoy using it)
customer_reviews.author: Mel Liddle

customer_reviews.title: Love this stamp!
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable and strong data stamp! Not the cheap kind, very professional and Sturdy. Needed if for my job, saves me time when I have to enter a date, instead of writing it I just stamp it!
customer_reviews.author: Mari Shade

customer_reviews.title: Quality item
customer_reviews.text: You can get your fingers pretty dirty with this, but after a while I got used to how to hold it when changing the date so I don't get ink on my fingers any more. Very good quality stamper
customer_reviews.author: Reba Jane

customer_reviews.title: I love office supplies
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun stamp to use. Easy to change the date. Just make sure you keep fingers on the spin dial as to not get ink on you. It easily stamps dark and clear the first time, no need to test it or keep pre-stamping. High quality, very sturdy and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Merchandise at decent price
customer_reviews.text: Love Trodat Stamps. They are always well made and sturdy. Thanks for saving my wrists. I have to manually stamp 500 documents at a time, this little model helps me breeze through. Highly recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Mark S. Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Great Date Stamper
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased a less expensive plastic self inking date stamper and was disappointed to find that everytime I changed the date ink got all over my fingers. Plus the print was uneven. Tried this product and love it!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Marbell

customer_reviews.title: This is my very first professional stamp I use it ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my very first professional stamp I use it when grading papers. The ink is free-flowing and is a very vibrant the black color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works great but would be better if it had a case or lid or something to that effect.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: We get a lot of faxes for business and needed something to date-stamp them on the back. I am impressed with the quality and the price. Very easy to use. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Gavaronee

customer_reviews.title: I love using this stamper!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very satisfying to stamp documents with, high quality!
customer_reviews.author: NiMarie

customer_reviews.title: This is a great date stamp
customer_reviews.text: This is a great date stamp. It's clear and easy to read. I've bought several different date stamps to use on boxes that come in and this is by far the easiest to read and I only have to stamp once where the others it would take me several tries to make it legible.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I wish it was easier to see the date you are trying to set.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Beltes

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: Is a great tool to use. Saves me a lot of time
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L.

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Easy to replace ink pad. Great for my classroom.
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy duty date stamp not the cheapy kind! Buy you wont regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: cristina

customer_reviews.title: It's a stamper, I was hoping it would walk ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a stamper, I was hoping it would walk the dog, and wash the car, but it doesn't...As a stamper it does what it's supposed to do. No deduction for not being able to walk the dog or wash the car, as those jobs weren't advertised in the description..I was just being hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K. Jacobi

customer_reviews.title: No inkpad?
customer_reviews.text: I expected the T5030 package to include an ink cartridge and instructions. Disappointed that it contained neither. The stamper itself looks pretty sturdy. Just waiting for ink now, so I can try it.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: NICE STAMPER
customer_reviews.text: NICE PRODUCT AND I GUESS IN TODAYS STANDARD THIS IS HEAVY DUTY. I READ STEEL CONSTRUCTION AND THOUGHT IT HAD A STEEL FRAME. IT HAS A STAMPED STEEL BRACE BUT IT SERVES ITS PURPOSE.
customer_reviews.author: paul

customer_reviews.title: Great stamp!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for. Very happy with the stamp.
customer_reviews.author: monica

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and heavy duty. Way better than some of the all plastic options out there. Easy to spin the date wheels.
customer_reviews.author: IrishLass

customer_reviews.title: Great build quality but ink formulation is not good for my application
customer_reviews.text: I think the overall build is great, feels good in hand, stamps reliably. The ink however will only work on paper, and there is no mention of ink formulation or options during purchase or in product listing. I was stamping on a surface where a sharpie won't smudge with 5 minutes dry time, but this stamp's impression will smudge after overnight dry time.
customer_reviews.author: T. Church

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The ink is not water proof but functionality is great!
customer_reviews.author: Real Food Ranch

customer_reviews.title: Too big for cans
customer_reviews.text: I got this to stamp cans. I thought "bigger is better" - WRONG! This is too big, so it hits the edges of the can, and as a result, stamp does not reach can. Go slightly smaller if you want to do cans. decent quality thought.
customer_reviews.author: Chris C.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher and purchased this to date my kids daily writing. Works well!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customertmar

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive!!!! Cheap!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Not what was pictured!!!!!! It shows a brushed metal stamp. This is alllll plastic. NOT what I ordered!!! Also the phrases do NOT match!!! #6 should say emailed not charged
customer_reviews.author: Zulli

customer_reviews.title: A high quality metal stamp for the price of cheap plastic alternatives.
customer_reviews.text: A very high quality product which is far superior to the cheap plastic date stamps typically found at big box office supply stores. You can get this from Amazon for about the price of the store plastic versions and I think you will be much happier that you did.
customer_reviews.author: Particular

customer_reviews.title: Perfect except..
customer_reviews.text: Only black ink. Would be nice to have a red ink pad, but I nit-pick. Good sturdy stamp, has most every function one would care to date.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Holman, MPA, MHS

customer_reviews.title: should be better
customer_reviews.text: ok quality. after about 200 stamps the month quit stamping correctly. i'm not sure if it because of the ink pad or the month stamp not lining up correctly with the others.
customer_reviews.author: j morrison

customer_reviews.title: Great for classroom date stamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my old date stamp in my classroom. This is so much easier for young students to use and I love not having to have a separate ink pad.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Mindi

customer_reviews.title: Leaky
customer_reviews.text: Somehow this leaks black ink everywhere. Not all the time, but enough to surprise you with a black palm here and there.
customer_reviews.author: RenAbe

customer_reviews.title: print
customer_reviews.text: most of time, it misses some part of print ,so had to order from other place
customer_reviews.author: Sanjay Vora

customer_reviews.title: I had used another stamp before and tossed it after ...
customer_reviews.text: I had used another stamp before and tossed it after a day as I got ink all over my hands. With this one I don't have that problem. At first it was hard to change the date but have a bit it loosed up and became easier to change.
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy But Time Consuming
customer_reviews.text: The stamp works well and is simple to use. The only issue I have is with the "self inking" portion. The ink pad must be stored out of the stamp so the pad won't dry out. So if you only use the stamp a few times a week, installing and removing the ink pad becomes tedious and, frankly a waste of time. If you use a date stamp all day, this is an excellent choice but for lower volume users, a regular date stamp and a regular ink pad would be much easier and much quicker to use.
customer_reviews.author: Evan V.

customer_reviews.title: High quality stamp.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and sturdy. Much superior to the cheap plastic date stamps.
customer_reviews.author: 90Below

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, just very small numbers.happy With my purchase though. Nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Hills

customer_reviews.title: When did this form come in? Now we know!
customer_reviews.text: This is a blast to use for someone who grew up in the "post-paper" age. Only drawback is that it seems like I can never adjust the date without getting my fingers covered in ink.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Best I've had
customer_reviews.text: I am so tired of poor quality stamps. This shows exactly where you are placing date. It is perfect for our office. It never bleeds through and is so precise. And it is just the date, no other info. Just what I need.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to change the date
customer_reviews.text: Good quality plastic and metal. Large easy to read date printing. Easy to change the date without getting ink on your fingers. This is a great buy. I liked it so much I bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Works great, can get a bit messy when trying to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, can get a bit messy when trying to line up the numbers but it does it's job well.
customer_reviews.author: Mattie

customer_reviews.title: A Workhorse
customer_reviews.text: I use this to date prescriptions in my practice. Nice to avoid having to write the date every time, especially when there are multiple prescriptions to write. It's durable and it's easy to adjust the numbers.
customer_reviews.author: Stan57Top Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I've used less expensive date stamps that last a few months. This one is quality constructed, smooth action.
customer_reviews.author: M&S

customer_reviews.title: exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: just exactly what I wanted. its pretty simple. rotate to get the date you want. The ink seems to be doing great even months later. And its clear when I make the stamp. (It's also kinda fun)

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Nice stamp. Works well, however when changing the date and "stamp word" the ink can get on your hands pretty easily. Overall pretty nice to get all the stamp words in one stamper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. Would recommend it to anyone who wants to date mail, etc.

customer_reviews.title: ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Hard to turn month and year settings. Required putting on sturdy gloves to protect fingers.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a MESSAGE dater, this is the one for you! With the choice of 12 different messages AND the date, this can work for almost any job! Prints cleanly. LOVE IT!!

customer_reviews.title: This works great! It is top quality and a good price
customer_reviews.text: This works great! It is top quality and a good price. I use it everyday at my job.

In the last few weeks, the stamped date from the other Date Stamp is fading out while the Trodat Stamp is still going strong. I am ordering another Trodat Stamp.

customer_reviews.text: The product is good....but I certainly thought it would come with ink cartridges. I was disappointed to get the stamper but couldn't use it because it had not even a single cartridge with it.

product_meta.title: Trodat Professional 4.0 Date Stamp, Dater, Self-Inking, Impression Size: 1 5/8 x 3/8 Inches, Black (T5030)
product_meta.description: Size:3/8 x 1-5/8 inches| Style:DateU.S. Stamp & Sign Professional Date Stamp - Date Stamp - 1.63" x 0.38" - 4 Bands - Black
feature_bullets: Brushed stainless steel frame to withstand heavy usage
Built in date band cover ensures your fingers remain clean
Delivers 10 years of dates and thousands of impressions before the stamp pad needs to be replaced
Stamp impression is standard date format MONTH/DAY/YEAR
Delivers rapid impressions, perfect every time
